---
title: "News on this website"
date: 2020-03-06
slug: announcement
---

The COVID-19 pandemic in China has been basically controlled, and the number of newly-increased daily infections has been significantly reduced. Many provinces have achieved zero infection. In view of this situation, this website ceases to update the information and predictions on the pandemic situation in China.

The website focuses on the development of pandemic situation and information of pandemic prevention products/materials in countries around the world.

Please stay tuned to our website.
